Name: 再苟一步 One More Step
About the game: This is a game that integrates roguelike, adventure, auto chess, turn-based, strategy, and more. Roguelike Every map you enter is brand new. The monsters in each level game instance are randomly generated. Each card acquired in the initial game stage is random, and you can even get a purple hero directly at the beginning. Adventure There are many types of plots in the game for players to enter, including monsters, elite monsters, shops, lucky wizards, profiteers, purchasers, etc. Each plot corresponds to a different function, and players need to make the best route selection based on their current conditions. Planning ahead and thinking about the next few steps in advance will help you achieve the maximum benefit. Battle The battle mode adopts rules similar to the auto chess gameplay. Monsters have different attributes, skills, occupations, etc. Three or six different characters of the same profession play at the same time and connect to form a faction, which can trigger the unique professional skills of that faction. In addition, collocating reasonable equipment for different characters is also one of the major features of the game. The different coordination of characters, occupations, and equipment often causes some fantastic chemistry reactions in the battle lineup. Classic Lineup Chaser professions carry weapons such as poison darts and golden hatchet, which can break the restriction that ordinary attacks hit only one person, so as to attack repeatedly the rival lineup. The wizard profession carries equipment like a wizard's staff and a wizard's broom that triggers stuns and combo attacks, which can often prevent enemies from making moves. The assassin profession carries equipment with a high critical strike rate, which can break through the enemy's line of defense and completely defeat the enemy's rear line. More special gameplay combinations are left for you to explore by yourself.

Meta Description: Looking for information on 再苟一步 One More Step? Check out the release date (Nov 6, 2020), developer insights from 01 Games, and a complete game summary.
